maple: L := proc(a0,a1,n)    option remember;    if n = 0 then        a0 ;    elif n = 1 then        a1;    else        ceil( procname(a0,a1,n-1)^2/procname(a0,a1,n-2)) ;    end if;end proc:A048586 := proc(n)    L(6,8,n) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 12 2016
crossrefs: Subsequence of A048583. See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
